com.ibm.team.build.common.notification
Class NotificationCriteriaFromProjectConfigHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.build.common.notification.NotificationCriteriaFromProjectConfigHelper

public class NotificationCriteriaFromProjectConfigHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains methods for getting/setting NotificationCriteria objects from the Email Notification Project Configuration Data

Since:
0.8

Field Summary

Constructor Detail

NotificationCriteriaFromProjectConfigHelper

public NotificationCriteriaFromProjectConfigHelper()
Method Detail

getAllCriterias

public static java.util.List getAllCriterias(ModelElement configurationData)
Returns a list of criteria objects that may have been defined under the given process configuration model element.

Parameters:
configurationData - The model element in which to look for criteria nodes. This can be a model element that represents the "criterias" element, or it's direct parent element.
Returns:
a list of criteria objects, possibly empty, never null.

getCriteria

public static NotificationCriteria getCriteria(ModelElement modelElement)
Returns a NotificationCriteria object that may have been defined in the given process configuration model element.

Parameters:
modelElement - The model element which defines a notification criteria
Returns:
NotificationCriteria The criteria object as defined by the given process configuration model element. Will be null if the given model element is not a criteria node.

saveCriteriasIntoMemento

public static void saveCriteriasIntoMemento(java.lang.String configurationDataId,
                                            com.ibm.team.foundation.common.util.IMemento memento,
                                            java.util.List criterias)
Creates a memento based on the given notification criterias

Parameters:
configurationDataId - The id of the memento
memento - The memento which will store the criteria information
criterias - The list of criterias to be stored in the given memento
